tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC) Database Administration (DBA).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Connect to SQL Plus and View Container Details
tutorials.description: How to log in to SQL Plus and explore the Container Database (CDB) and Pluggable Database (PDB) with basic SQL commands.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Log in to Oracle EMCC
tutorials.description: How to log in to Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC) and access the homepage.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Manage Target Database and Listener
tutorials.description: How to manage the targets discovered by Oracle EMCC. View details of Oracle Database and listener and administer them from Oracle EMCC as managed targets.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Access Container Homepage from Cloud Control
tutorials.description: How to access the container homepage from Oracle EMCC. Learn how to switch between containers and manage your favorites.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
